posts.title: Domain Authority Guide 2026: How to Check and Improve DA
posts.author: Rahul Kumar
posts.excerpt: Complete guide to Domain Authority (DA). Learn how to check DA for any website, understand DA scores, and improve your website's authority with free tools.
posts.content:
Domain Authority (DA) is one of the most important metrics in SEO. Developed by Moz, this score predicts how well a website will rank on search engines. In this comprehensive guide, you'll learn everything about Domain Authority and how to improve it.

What is Domain Authority (DA)?

Domain Authority is a search engine ranking score developed by Moz that predicts how likely a website is to rank in search engine result pages (SERPs). It ranges from 1 to 100, with higher scores indicating a greater ability to rank.

ðŸ“Š Quick Facts:

  • Developed by: Moz
  • Scale: 1-100 (logarithmic)
  • Update Frequency: Every few weeks
  • Based on: Link profiles, root domains, MozRank, MozTrust

How to Check Domain Authority for Free

You can check any website's Domain Authority using our free tool. Here's how:

  1. Visit our Domain Authority Checker
  2. Enter any website URL (e.g., example.com)
  3. Click 'Check Authority'
  4. Get instant DA, PA, and spam score

Check Any Website's DA Now

Use our free Domain Authority Checker tool

Check DA/PA Now

What is a Good Domain Authority Score?

DA scores are relative and depend on your niche and competition:

  • 0-20: New website, needs improvement
  • 20-40: Average website, building authority
  • 40-60: Good authority, competitive in niche
  • 60-80: Strong authority, well-established
  • 80-100: Exceptional authority (like Wikipedia, Google)

posts.title: GST Calculator India: How to Calculate GST for Your Business?
posts.author: Priya Sharma
posts.excerpt: Complete guide to using GST calculator. Learn about CGST, SGST, IGST, reverse calculation, and how to file GST returns for your business.
posts.content:
GST (Goods and Services Tax) is an indirect tax used in India on the supply of goods and services. It is a comprehensive, multi-stage, destination-based tax that has replaced many indirect taxes. Our GST calculator helps you compute the tax easily.

What is GST?

Goods and Services Tax (GST) is an indirect tax levied on the supply of goods and services. It is a value-added tax that has replaced multiple indirect taxes like VAT, service tax, excise duty, etc.

GST Components

  • CGST: Central GST - collected by Central Government
  • SGST: State GST - collected by State Government
  • IGST: Integrated GST - collected by Central Government for inter-state transactions

Calculate GST Instantly

Use our free GST Calculator for all tax slabs

Calculate GST Now

posts.content:
UPI (Unified Payments Interface) has revolutionized digital payments in India. With our UPI QR Generator, you can create custom QR codes for your business in seconds.

Why Use UPI QR Codes?

How to Generate UPI QR Code

posts.title: Core Web Vitals 2026: INP, LCP, CLS Complete Guide
posts.author: Vikas Singh
posts.excerpt: Learn about Google's Core Web Vitals including INP (Interaction to Next Paint) that replaced FID. Improve your website speed and user experience.
posts.content:
Core Web Vitals are a set of specific factors that Google considers important in a webpage's overall user experience. In 2026, INP (Interaction to Next Paint) has replaced FID as a key metric.

The Three Core Web Vitals

1. Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)

Measures loading performance. To provide a good user experience, LCP should occur within 2.5 seconds of when the page first starts loading.

2. Interaction to Next Paint (INP)

Replaced FID in 2024. INP measures a page's overall responsiveness to user interactions by observing the latency of all click, tap, and keyboard interactions.

3. Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)

Measures visual stability. Pages should maintain a CLS of less than 0.1.

Check Your Website's Core Web Vitals

Use our free PageSpeed Insights tool

Test Now
